alert.note: Alert for Grundy; Harrison; Mercer (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 10:36PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Grundy, southwestern Mercer and central Harrison Counties through 1115 PM CDT... At 1036 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Bethany, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bethany, Princeton, Ridgeway, New Hampton, Cainsville, Spickard, Mount Moriah, Tindall, Modena, Martinsville and Mill Grove. This includes Interstate 35 in Missouri between mile markers 89 and 105. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for north central and northwestern Missouri.
